company.vmodev: Vmodev Hanoi Technology Joint Stock Company

major.react_native: Mobile Application Programming by React Native

description.bbb: BicycleBlueBook.com is a first of its kind valuation authority, designed to provide cycling enthusiasts with the safest and the easiest way to assess the value of a bike. User can see value of a bike and then buy used bikes from most trusted partner.
description.bbb_crm: Admin.BicycleBlueBook.com is a customer relationship management web application. An approach to manage a company's interaction with current and potential customers. It uses data analysis about customers' history with a company to improve business relationships with customers, specifically focusing on customer retention and ultimately driving sales growth.
description.photobook: Photobook AI is an application for uploading images, and create a photobook within a click. All photo is being processed by AI to get best crop position.
description.vn24_customer: ViecNha 24H Customer is the the application to support delivery of chores.
description.vn24_helper: ViecNha 24H Helper is the the application to support receipt of chores.
description.my_coach: MyCoach.work is a personal support service that helps you organize your concerns and issues, acquire the knowledge, skills, and ideas necessary to achieve your goals, and act.
description.mec: MechanicsMarketplace.com is a website for auto repair industry.
description.mec_crm: MechanicsMarketplace.com/Admin is a customer relationship management web application for auto repair industry.
